List all available REST services and their parameters

Source: R/MetadataClient-wrapper.r
metadata_get_rest_services.Rd

This is a wrapper for the method get_rest_services from class MetadataClient.

metadata_get_rest_services(returnType = "data.frame", ...)

Arguments

returnType

Either list or data.frame (default)
...

additional parameters passed to get_rest_services from class nbaR.MetadataClient

Value

list or data.frame, as specified by returnType

Details

Lists end point name, http method, response type, and URL

See also

Other nbaR.MetadataClient-wrappers: metadata_get_allowed_date_formats, metadata_get_controlled_list_phase_or_stage, metadata_get_controlled_list_sex, metadata_get_controlled_list_specimen_type_status, metadata_get_controlled_list_taxonomic_status, metadata_get_controlled_lists, metadata_get_settings, metadata_get_setting, metadata_get_source_systems
